robot.impl

Class FieldMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.impl.FieldMatrix

  • public class FieldMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    A Matrix implementation which represents the field with his items as a matrix.
    Author:
    zannc2 & gfells4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FieldMatrix(Size fieldSize, Size gridSize)
      Constructor which creates a new matrix.
      FieldMatrix(Size fieldSize, Size gridSize, Field f)
      Constructor which creates a new matrix and fills it with the items in the given field.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • FieldMatrix

        public FieldMatrix(Size fieldSize,
           Size gridSize)
        Constructor which creates a new matrix. Field is unknown, so there are no items to fill in the matrix.
        Parameters:
        fieldSize - the size of the field
        gridSize - the size of each grid

      • FieldMatrix

        public FieldMatrix(Size fieldSize,
           Size gridSize,
           Field f)
        Constructor which creates a new matrix and fills it with the items in the given field.
        Parameters:
        fieldSize - the size of the field
        gridSize - the size of each grid
        f - the given field

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        returns the value on the asked position
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns the value on the position, 0:unknown/robot, 1:item, 2:finish
